title: Enhancing Language Communication Competencies Through Virtual Space Simulation-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of intercultural communication
context.additional_context: Student-led project execution in smartphone-based limited technical environments

learning_goals: Successfully perform three or more cross-cultural negotiation scenarios in a virtual simulation environment.
Improve two or more language use strategies through peer feedback and reflective journaling.
Propose communication protocols applicable to real business situations as team-based project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
